summary: Discover the back story around a magical elven artifact called the Flask of Lillandril, originally featured in The Elder Scrolls Adventures: Redgame, and obtain a powerful new shield in the process.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new shield to the game, the Shield of Lillandril. Originally featured in The Elder Scrolls Adventures: Redguard as a magical elven flask that protected it\'s bearer from magical attacks, it was been reworked into an elven shield with a new texture. 

The shield can be found in a large chest at the shrine of Clavicus Vile. Along with the shield comes a book that gives the official canon back-story to the original artifact.

This is a small mod designed primarily for those interested in learning a bit of interesting Elder Scrolls lore who also would like get a cool new shield. Everything discussed in the book is canon except the last parts about reworking the flask into a shield.

Credits
Sader325 - For the shield texture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5600/
NexusMods - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com
Bethesda - http://bethsoft.com
author: Faustuss2
